description.p: VDrift is a cross-platform, open source driving simulation.
VDrift features over 40 cars and tracks, downloadable using the integrated update system, and offers challenging racing against up to 7 AI opponents.

VDrift aims to provide an accurate driving physics emulation, based on real world data of the actual vehicles, employing a full rigid body simulation and a complex tire model. The recommended input method is a steering wheel with pedals and force feedback support.
